// read hit, load-use hazard, write hit
// load/store to the blocks with different index

// index=0x00, tag=0x00
000000000000_00000_010_01111_0000011  // lw x15,0x0(x0)
0100000_01000_01111_101_01111_0010011 // srai x15, x15, 8
0000000_01111_00000_010_00000_0100011 // sw x15, 0x0(x0)
000000000100_00000_010_01110_0000011  // lw x14,0x4(x0)
0100000_01000_01110_101_01110_0010011 // srai x14, x14, 8
0000000_01110_00000_010_00100_0100011 // sw x14, 0x4(x0)
000000001000_00000_010_01101_0000011  // lw x13,0x8(x0)
0100000_01000_01101_101_01101_0010011 // srai x13, x13, 8
0000000_01101_00000_010_01000_0100011 // sw x13, 0x8(x0)
000000001100_00000_010_01100_0000011  // lw x12,0xc(x0)
0100000_01000_01100_101_01100_0010011 // srai x12, x12, 8
0000000_01100_00000_010_01100_0100011 // sw x12, 0xc(x0)
000000010000_00000_010_01011_0000011  // lw x11,0x10(x0)
0100000_01000_01011_101_01011_0010011 // srai x11, x11, 8
0000000_01011_00000_010_10000_0100011 // sw x11, 0x10(x0)
000000010100_00000_010_01010_0000011  // lw x10,0x14(x0)

0000000_01010_00000_010_10100_0100011 // sw x10, 0x14(x0)
